about_the_game:
Freshen up your trucks with an original and modern livery. Introducing the Super Stripes Paint Jobs Pack, now available for all current truck models in Euro Truck Simulator 2.

These new unique and colorful designs have been hand-crafted by our talented artists and is the first paint job pack to feature predefined color presets alongside a fully customizable color palette, giving you a wider array of options when customizing your truck in the upgrade shop.

This pack includes six marvelous paint schemes:

  • Meteor
  • Flash
  • Metro
  • Zap
  • Solid
  • Whirl

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
detailed_description:
Freshen up your trucks with an original and modern livery. Introducing the Super Stripes Paint Jobs Pack, now available for all current truck models in Euro Truck Simulator 2.

These new unique and colorful designs have been hand-crafted by our talented artists and is the first paint job pack to feature predefined color presets alongside a fully customizable color palette, giving you a wider array of options when customizing your truck in the upgrade shop.

This pack includes six marvelous paint schemes:

  • Meteor
  • Flash
  • Metro
  • Zap
  • Solid
  • Whirl

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
